        protected junit.framework.TestSuite createSuite()

      • buildCheckInfoMap

        public static Map<String,CheckInfo> buildCheckInfoMap(Class<?> clazz)
                                               throws IOException
        Builds a map from simple class names to check infos. The simple class name must be unique. The rational here is avoid classes with same name in different packages (confusing) but also make the test-data more readable. The clazz will be used to resolve the classpath to search for checks.
        Throws:
        IOException
